negative_prompts.standard: (deformed iris, deformed pupils, semi-realistic, cgi, 3d, render, sketch, cartoon, drawing, anime:1.4), text, close up, cropped, out of frame, worst quality, low quality, jpeg artifacts, ugly, duplicate, morbid, mutilated, extra fingers, mutated hands, poorly drawn hands, poorly drawn face, mutation, deformed, blurry, dehydrated, bad anatomy, bad proportions, extra limbs, cloned face, disfigured, gross proportions, malformed limbs, missing arms, missing legs, extra arms, extra legs, fused fingers, too many fingers, long neck
negative_prompts.asian_focused: Western face, Caucasian features, European features, blonde hair, blue eyes, green eyes, high nose bridge, deep-set eyes, freckles, pale pink skin, non-Asian features, mixed race
negative_prompts.quality: low quality, worst quality, jpeg artifacts, pixelated, blurry, out of focus, poorly lit, overexposed, underexposed, amateur photography
